"""
Creative workshop facilitator requests binder clips and art supplies for creative workshop session.
Provide information about creative workshop support and coordinate art materials delivery.

ROLES: user (creative workshop facilitator organizing art materials), assistant (creative services coordinator)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Executive Tower Business Hotel (hotel_id: etbh_downtown_01)
Address: 2200 Commerce Street, Dallas, TX 75201
Timezone: America/Chicago
Focus: Premier business accommodations in the heart of the financial district

Business Services:
- 24/7 business center with comprehensive office supplies and equipment.
- Supply inventory: binder clips (small/medium/large), paper clips, staples, rubber bands, push pins.
- Additional items: premium paper, pens, markers, sticky notes, folders, presentation supplies.
- Same-floor delivery service for executive floor guests (floors 20-35).
- Standard delivery to other floors within 45 minutes.

Creative Workshop Support:
- Creative workshop materials and art supplies organization.
- Workshop presentation materials and creative document services.
- Art supply delivery and creative workshop setup assistance.
- Creative document printing and design services.
- Workshop space coordination and creative environment setup.

Guest Services:
- Complimentary basic office supplies for executive members.
- Priority business services for extended-stay corporate clients.
- Document printing, binding, and presentation preparation assistance.

user:
Hello! I'm facilitating a creative workshop tomorrow and need binder clips to organize my art materials and workshop handouts. Do you have creative workshop support?

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator needs binder clips and creative workshop support for art materials and handouts. I have information about creative workshop support in the system prompt.

assistant channel=final:
Hello! We have excellent binder clips available in small, medium, and large sizes, plus comprehensive creative workshop support services. We offer creative workshop materials organization, art supplies delivery, and workshop presentation materials. Our services include creative document printing and design services. What's your room number so I can arrange delivery?

user:
I'm in room 2847. I need small binder clips for organizing art supplies and medium clips for workshop handouts. What creative services do you offer?

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator wants small binder clips for art supplies and medium clips for workshop handouts in room 2847. I should provide information about creative services and arrange the support.

assistant channel=final:
Perfect! I'll arrange small binder clips for your art supplies and medium clips for workshop handouts, delivered to room 2847. We offer creative workshop materials organization, art supplies delivery, and workshop presentation materials. Our services include creative document printing and design services. The organization service will be completed within 45 minutes.

user:
That's wonderful! Do you have art supplies available for workshops?

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator asks about art supplies availability. This specific art supplies information isn't detailed in the system prompt, so I should use the special flag.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Let me check what art supplies we have available for workshops. Looking into the creative materials options.

user:
No problem, I can ask about that when the clips arrive. Do you have workshop space coordination services?

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator asks about workshop space coordination services. This information is available in the system prompt about creative workshop support.

assistant channel=final:
Yes! We offer workshop space coordination and creative environment setup services. Our team can help coordinate workshop space, creative environment setup, and workshop presentation preparation. We provide comprehensive support to ensure your creative workshop has the perfect space and setup.

user:
Excellent! Do you have any creative document design services for workshop materials?

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator asks about creative document design services. This information is available in the system prompt about creative workshop support.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! We have creative document printing and design services available for workshop materials. Our services include creative document design, workshop presentation materials, and artistic document formatting. We can help create professional and creative workshop handouts and materials.

user:
Perfect! Thank you for the excellent creative workshop support!

assistant channel=analysis:
Creative workshop facilitator is satisfied and ending the conversation positively. Simple acknowledgment needed.

assistant channel=final:
You're very welcome! Your small and medium binder clips will arrive shortly, along with our creative workshop support services. Our workshop space coordination and creative document design services will help make your creative workshop a success. Have a wonderful creative workshop tomorrow!
